reviews.sentence: Clean and Simple. We loved our time at this hotel. We are pretty low key and we appreciated this easy going feel at this place. Great staff. Always friendly knowledgeable enjoyable and personable. Bike rental here was more than reasonable and the complimentary breakfast was simple but much appreciated. We would choose this place again. If you like fancy or to be doted on maybe this would not be for you. But if you like to be treated well and live clean and simple on the beach this one is well worth it.

Great beach stay. The location is ideal. Everything Pacific Beach has to offer is within walking distance. Oscars is a block awayMy room was upstairs and had an AMAZING view. The room is not the most luxurious but it was clean and comfortable. The staff are very friendly and accommodating. I had recommend Pacific View to anyone looking for a beach getaway at a reasonable price.

4th of July at The Pacific View Inn. Being at the beach was an awesome experience. The room was cozy and beachy. Being right on the beach on the 2nd FL where windows could be left open and feel secure. Listening to the ocean waves at night was relaxing. Pacific beach is full of energy with young and old nearby shops and restaurants all within walking distance. No air conditioning a little bit over priced and the shower was small.

Noisy Loud and a ripof. I recently stayed at the Pacific View Inn they allowed multiple college age kids to stay at their hotel. These drunk people decided that 2 am was the perfect time to party and wake up everyone around them. They were drinking playing loud music and smoking. Why this place does Not have Security to quickly take care of these issues in beyond my comprehension. The place is a dump I will not come back again and I suggest you do not either.

For the money this hotel is just right. The service and amenities are good enough but the location and the price are what will bring you back. location and cost Beach boardwalk dining and bars Update maintain rooms.
Great independent hotel in PB. Location is awesome and staff is great. No AC but we knew that we just happened to have a very warm 2 days in San Diego.
Last minute decision to stay in PB for my birthday and we got a room right away with an incredible view of the ocean and sunset. The service was so chill and welcoming. I will be back for sure.
Excelente. Loved it would definitely stay there again. The location is great easy access to beach shops places to eat drink. Staff was very nice accommodated us well.

Absolutely an amazing hotel to stay at. Room quality was great bed was clean and nice we did a 3 night stay here. Huge bed cabinets and refrigerator. Closet and dressers decent restroom and shower. Only negative thing was the air conditioning there s only a decent size fan in the room. Two windows you can open to get air in the room that helps one is super large. The location and price of the hotel makes it all worth it though. Come out of the room and ur on the beach walk way. Parking is free on the streets beside the hotel but they feel up fast. Parking for the hotel is 20 extra a night. Location has tons of shops and places to eat. Book with the hotel direct and you get a way better deal than expedia ans the other sites. Service is amazing at the hotel everyone is nice and friendly. Their is also a small continental breakfast from i believe 7 am 10am Ask for Josh great guy there at the hotel to set up you re reservation.

Pleasant. It locates at exactly beach front and is less expensive than other hotels. Hotel staff was very kind and lovely. No private parking because of the building is under remodeling and no air conditioner. Too hot to sleep and have to open the window inconsequence disturbed by the noises outside during the night time as it locates at the popular beach access road. Not a few peoples visit the beach after mid night.

This place is a dump with no parking. This hotel is under construction and is a disaster. Our room smelled like it had just been painted. The safe had no power. There were no toiletries no phone and only a thin sheet on the bed. Getting to the room was dangerous as the entire property is torn apart. Additionally there was no parking in an extremely busy area. This is the worst hotel experience I have ever had. Last the staff was rude and unapologetic. The hotel should not be open during construction. In addition to being unpleasant it is unsafe.

This place is a dump with no parking. This hotel is under construction and is a disaster. Our room smelled like it had just been painted. The safe had no power. There were no toiletries no phone and only a thin sheet on the bed. Getting to the room was dangerous as the entire property is torn apart. Additionally there was no parking in an extremely busy area. This is the worst hotel experience I have ever had. Last the staff was rude and unapologetic. The hotel should not be open during construction. In addition to being unpleasant it is unsafe.

Construction site. I do n’t even understand how this hotel is allowed to bookings with the current State of it. The whole hotel is a construction site. The rooms we were put in we were told we would n’t here the construction work being done but sure enough the very next morning we was woken up by hammers smashing and machinery working. An absolute joke. The rooms were cold and all we had was a sheet on the bed to keep warm. The doors do n’t lock when you leave unles you slam them shut. The room photos on the website give the illusion of sea views from the windows but all we had was the view of the next building. The ONLY upside is as the location was near the beach. Apart from that I would not recommend staying here.

Terrible value for the money. location. Nothing else. Property is under construction and dangerous. No hand rail on stairs. No blankets on bed. No closet to hang clothes. No hooks in bathroom to hang towels. Parking terrible. Do not stay here.

if I went in six months it would have been great. great location breakfast became better after the first day pleasant people except for the cleaning lady no smilethe manager did put his car where mine was to keep my spot very nice of him to do sothe noises all night long kept us from sleeping. the tv did not have choices of channels except for the channels selling articles of jewelry or clothing etc. The safe was not set up yet. The place was under construction which I did not notice when I looked online.

Listen to the negative reviews. I typically do n’t leave reviews but this place is particularly bad. I stayed in an updated room. Not comfortable awkwardly sized furniture no hair dryer provided and REEKED of Fabuloso. The door does not shut and lock unles you slam it. UNDER ACTIVE CONSTRUCTION and large dumpsters are taking what little street parking is available still street parking though so not guaranteed and may have to move for street sweeping. Location is great and staff was friendly but I would absolutely not stay here again. Even once construction is complete I do n’t think the results will be ever worth returning.

Overpriced room. Great location potential for good ocean viewsthe help was nice did the best they couldchrisp color scheme in the room. Dust accumulations in the room from construction. Room space unavigablenot enough blankets available. Needed room key to operate lightsnothing made any workable sense in the room. Black grout ran down the shower wall as we operated the showerhalway echoed like a college dorm.

So as others have said they are still remodeling. So many of the rooms with a view are not finished. Thus our first room we ended up with we barely fit in and the new tv was somehow not connected correctly so it did nt work. They gave us a slightly bigger room with a working tv so that was resolved. but heres the rest your key card is required to operate the main lights and it is ridiculousrom temp is tough to maintain the barn door slider that separates the bathroom from the main sleeping area does nt lock so it opens while you are in there. The pillows are horrible although apparently new barely any blankets in the room and the cobalt blue paint kn the upper walls could keep you up at night. The space is poorly designed and is hard to navigate and the outer hallways are echoey and there is little nuance thereit feels like a hostel trying to get to modern swank if that is a thing. The office is not impressive if you are looking for a confidence builder to offset the remodel. But literally the best point is yes it is right on the beachjust do nt actually try to enjoy the stay part of being here and keep all aspects of your stay outside of the room until you return at night to struggle to find a parking spot and promptly pass out on your bed. A great option for partying bachleorsthat is all.
